root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 16-5-2, translated into en
root.data: This indicator is computed using data collected from the World Bank’s Enterprise Surveys. A detailed manual and guide on the Enterprise Surveys implementation is found here (https://www.enterprisesurveys.org/content/dam/enterprisesurveys/documents/methodology/Enterprise%20Surveys_Manual%20and%20Guide.pdf). Section 4.4 “Data Collection Cycle” of this document describes the processes in place used to validate or check the survey data which is collected to ensure quality.
